question: What happens if Max ignores Kate's video link in the shower room?

choices.A: The link will be erased by other people
choices.C: Kate will be upset and refuse to talk any further
choices.D: Max will be given four options to say to Kate during the conversation on the rooftop

question: What is the consequence of Max giving Kate the advice to go to the police?

choices.A: Kate will be appreciative and send Max SMS messages later to thank her for the advice
choices.B: Kate will be upset and refuse to talk any further
choices.C: Max will be given two options to say to Kate during the conversation on the rooftop
choices.D: Taylor will be more open and trusting to Max at the party

question: What is the consequence of Max choosing Belgian Waffles for breakfast at Two Whales Diner?

choices.A: The Nightmare-Max sitting at the same place as Max in Episode 5 will also be eating Belgian Waffles
choices.B: The Nightmare-Max sitting at the same place as Max in Episode 5 will also be eating Bacon Omelette
choices.C: Brooke will be upset with Max and will not allow her to fly her drone
choices.D: Taylor will be uncertain in believing Max's promise not to tell anyone about Victoria sneaking out
